content.rendered:
Directed by Rajeev Ravi

Written by Sreejith Divakaran. Sibi Thomas

Star Asif Ali (Sajan Philip). Sunny Wayne (Rajesh Mathew). Alencier Ley Lopez (Basheer). Sharafudheen (Abin Raj). Senthil Krishna (Rajeevan). Sibi Thomas (Aravindan). Jenny Pallath (Superintendent of Police). Srindaa (Mookkan’s Wife). Madhusoodhanan (Dy. Superintendent of Police). Jibin (Jothish). Babudas Kodoth (Police Driver). Mano Jose (Suhail). Dinu Palluruthy (Shivan). Vasudevan R. Verma (Paily). Mridula (Rajesh’s Wife). Kripesh Ayyappankutty (Workshop Employee). Deepu Thomas (Mathew). Sumesh Chittooran (Sreejith). Rajesh Kumar P.G. (Sujith). G. Sethunath (Mookkan). Noufal (The Person Reported the Theft). Aneesh Sebastian (Sajan’s Driver). Jayashankar Mundancherry (Jewellery Owner). Arjun Lakshmi Narayan (Rahul). Tom Jo (Crime Scene Inspector). Sujith Surendran (Bijoy). Dhanya Mohan (Nurse). Aneesh Viswambaran (Hospital Employee). Sreenivasan Cheruthoni (Lottery Seller). Bincy (Paily’s Wife). Dinesh Pradhan (Dholliar). Deshraj Gurjar (Nethram). Pooja Gurjar (Nethram’s Sister). Maheshwari Shekhawat (Nethram’s Wife). Sanjay Vidrohi (Asok Pankaj). Stalin Bhargavan (Arrack Agent). Kuldip Medthiya (Thief). Bhawar Singh (Sisodhiya)

Language Malayalam

Producers Pramod Sankar. Anishkumar V.R.. Arun Kumar V.R.

Production Collective Studio. Film Roll Productions. March First
